title: About Us
mission: Our mission is to empower bars and restaurants with intuitive and efficient technology.
vision: To be the leading management platform for the gastronomic sector, recognized for innovation and support.
story: Monynha Softwares was born from a passion for technology and the food and beverage industry. Our name, 'Monynha', represents the strength and resilience of those who seek to make a difference, celebrating diversity and innovation in every solution we create. We believe that technology should be a tool for empowerment, and it is with this spirit that we developed Boteco Pro, so that every entrepreneur can manage their business with pride and efficiency.

partnership.title: Technology Partnership
partnership.description: BotecoPro is developed with the technological support of Monynha Softwares, specialized in web & mobile platforms, integrations/APIs and technical consulting. A partnership focused on reliability, accessibility and continuous evolution.
